greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{ p | n } (1 + Legendre(-7,p) ).
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with(numtheory); L := proc(n,N) local i,t1,t2; t1 := ifactors(n)[2]; t2 := mul((1+legendre(N,t1[i][1])),i=1..nops(t1)); end; [seq(L(n,-7),n=1..120)];
program: (PARI) a(n)={my(f=factor(n)[,1]); prod(i=1, #f, 1 + kronecker(-7, f[i]))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Jul 23 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 02 2004
